description:
If you have sustained an injury in an MVA or any other catastrophic accident, come to the law firm of Shani O. Brooks P.C., in Atlanta, Georgia. We practice only personal injury law and proudly serve clients throughout the Atlanta metropolitan area, including Buckhead, Sandy Springs and Stockbridge.

We are a full-service personal injury law firm, providing our injured clients with advice, counsel and aggressive representation in the following areas:

  • Motor vehicle accidents: auto, truck, motorcycle, pedestrian
  • Premises liability: slips and falls, dog bites, swimming pool accidents, grocery store or restaurant liability, negligent or inadequate maintenance, negligent or inadequate security, retail store or mall liability, dangerous property conditions
  • Medical malpractice: physician negligence, hospital negligence, failure to diagnose, misdiagnosis, surgical errors, anesthesia errors, birth injuries, medication errors
  • Personal injury: bicycle accidents, defective products, brain injuries, spinal cord injuries

We also compassionately represent grieving families who have lost a loved one because of wrongful death.
Our law firm's results speak for themselves:

  • $1 million recovered for a man involved in an automobile accident
  • $290,000 recovered for a child who injured his hand at a restaurant
  • $125,000 recovered for a man injured in a car accident
  • $100,000 recovered for a man involved in a trucking accident
  • $50,000 recovered for a man injured by a defective automotive product accident
  • $32,500 recovered for a man involved in a minor trucking accident

Shani O. Brooks P.C. accepts credit cards and offers free initial consultations and virtual appointments for our clients' peace of mind.
